alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 09 at 5:51PM ChST until April 11 at 6:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. Stronger winds in higher terrain. * WHERE...Mariana Islands * WHEN...Until 6 PM ChST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Winds will be greater in higher terrain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong gusty winds have occurred across the islands through the day. Peak winds in the 35 to 40 mph range have been recorded from Saipan to Guam. These winds are indirectly related to TS Malakas whose low pressure contributes to the pressure gradient across the islands. Winds will begin to subside Monday evening.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
